modVersion.name: Version
modVersion.hint: Currently installed module version (can't be changed here).

debug.name: Debug mode
debug.hint: Client-side setting enabling extended debug logging.

isActive.name: Always active
isActive.hint: Keep module always activated, unless overridden by macro code.

hideChatInfo.name: Hide module info in chat window
hideChatInfo.hint: Hides the general one-time info about this mod in the chat. If you want to see again on next reload, UNCHECK this option.

hideChatWarnings.name: Hide warnings in chat window
hideChatWarnings.hint: Hides sporadic version warnings after a mod update in the chat. If you want to see those again on next reload, UNCHECK this option.

notifyOnChange.name: UI messages on toggle
notifyOnChange.hint: Show temporary UI messages whenever toggling on and off (also works when switching via macro code).

warnWhenON.name: Warning on activate
warnWhenON.hint: Show extra prominent UI message (warning) when toggling ON. Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.

warnWhenOFF.name: Warning on deactivate
warnWhenOFF.hint: Show extra prominent UI message (warning) when toggling OFF. Needs option "UI messages on toggle" to be enabled.

afMode.name: Mode
afMode.hint: Disabled: Module off (default) | Party View: all player owned tokens | Selected Token: only the selected token.

afAutoZoom.name: Auto Zoom
afAutoZoom.hint: Adjust zoom as well as position. Highly Recommended.

afMitigateBounce.name: Mitigate Bouncing Issue
afMitigateBounce.hint: Only relevant when Auto Zoom is set to off and Mode is Party View. Forces Auto Zoom when required.

afPaddingSq.name: Padding (squares)
afPaddingSq.hint: Padding added to view area in all directions. Highly Recommended to be set to >2 and will have no effect <1.

afMaxZoom.name: Max zoom level
afMaxZoom.hint: Hint: 0.1 is far away, 3 is very close.

afIncludeInvisible.name: Include Invisible
afIncludeInvisible.hint: Whether to account for tokens that can't be seen by the user in the party view calculations.

chatInfoContent.title: Hot Pan & Zoom!
chatInfoContent.text1: "One Thing to Pan Them! One Thing to Find Them! One Thing to Zoom them and to the GM's Canvas Bind Them!"
chatInfoContent.text2: Hot Pan & Zoom! is a systems-agnostic utility for keeping players' canvas position & zoom in sync with the GM's screen. It runs in the backend, but is also controllable through macro code.
chatInfoContent.text3: Please refer to the various module preferences under game settings. Find even more details on GitHub
chatInfoContent.footer: This chat card will only be shown once. Activate once more in the module settings if needed.

onOffUIMessage.whenON: Screen is remote controlled by the gamemaster!

autoFocus.title: Auto Focus (fka 'Always Centred')
autoFocus.description: Additional auto-focussing and auto-zooming onto scene tokens (can be switched on/off separately). Formerly known as 'Always Centred' by SDoehren. Works excellently in line with Hot Pan & Zoom! Merged into this mod with approval by its author. Find the original mod at

msg.invalidMode: You've tried to set an invalid mode for Auto Focus:
msg.whenON: Auto Focus is ENABLED and set to '{mode}'.

alwaysCentredWarning.title:
Warning:
Original Mod 'Always Centred' detected!
alwaysCentredWarning.text:
Hot Pan & Zoom! has detected that the mod 'Always Centred' is running in your game.
This mod has been integrated into Hot Pan & Zoom! since mod version 12.1.0.
It is recommended that you uninstall 'Always Centred', to avoid conflicts.
The only reason to keep the original would be if players still want to use and configure auto-focussing and auto-zooming locally on their clients.
alwaysCentredWarning.footer: This chat card will only be shown once!
